<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### compare() {#a0651aa0a52c69c4fe12cf730e7ed65ab}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class DigitsT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>int llvm::ScaledNumbers::compare (DigitsT LDigits, int16&#95;t LScale, DigitsT RDigits, int16&#95;t RScale)</>}>
Compare two scaled numbers.

Compare two scaled numbers. Returns 0 for equal, -1 for less than, and 1 for greater than.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h/#l00252">252</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h">ScaledNumber.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### compareImpl() {#ac4653521234cb7bc516c08e898036a42}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int llvm::ScaledNumbers::compareImpl (uint64&#95;t L, uint64&#95;t R, int ScaleDiff)</>}>
Implementation for comparing scaled numbers.

Compare two 64-bit numbers with different scales. Given that the scale of <code>L</code> is higher than that of <code>R</code> by <code>ScaleDiff</code>, compare them. Return -1, 1, and 0 for less than, greater than, and equal, respectively.


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
0 &lt;= ScaleDiff &lt; 64.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h/#l00245">245</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h">ScaledNumber.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/scalednumber-cpp/#l00124">124</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/scalednumber-cpp">ScaledNumber.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### divide32() {#aa14759185c83674952abadab760c2028}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::pair&lt; uint32&#95;t, int16&#95;t &gt; llvm::ScaledNumbers::divide32 (uint32&#95;t Dividend, uint32&#95;t Divisor)</>}>
Divide two 32-bit integers to create a 32-bit scaled number.

Implemented with one 64-bit integer divide/remainder pair.


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
<code>Dividend</code> and <code>Divisor</code> are non-zero.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h/#l00145">145</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h">ScaledNumber.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/scalednumber-cpp/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/scalednumber-cpp">ScaledNumber.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### divide64() {#a0a6b36937186eb47bc6004f2eb0a7eee}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::pair&lt; uint64&#95;t, int16&#95;t &gt; llvm::ScaledNumbers::divide64 (uint64&#95;t Dividend, uint64&#95;t Divisor)</>}>
Divide two 64-bit integers to create a 64-bit scaled number.

Implemented with long division.


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
<code>Dividend</code> and <code>Divisor</code> are non-zero.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h/#l00138">138</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h">ScaledNumber.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/scalednumber-cpp/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/scalednumber-cpp">ScaledNumber.cpp</a>.

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Adjust a 64-bit scaled number down to the appropriate width.

<SectionUser title="Precondition">
Adding 64 to <code>Scale</code> will not overflow INT16&#95;MAX.
</SectionUser>

### getDifference() {#ab9b560559be7a6630fbee210b5b46f39}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class DigitsT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>std::pair&lt; DigitsT, int16&#95;t &gt; llvm::ScaledNumbers::getDifference (DigitsT LDigits, int16&#95;t LScale, DigitsT RDigits, int16&#95;t RScale)</>}>
Get the difference of two scaled numbers.

Get LHS minus RHS with as much precision as possible.

Returns <code></code>(0, 0) if the RHS is larger than the LHS.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h/#l00373">373</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h">ScaledNumber.h</a>.

### getLg() {#ab63347a46b40b723f19ea7e153024a5e}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class DigitsT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>int32&#95;t llvm::ScaledNumbers::getLg (DigitsT Digits, int16&#95;t Scale)</>}>
Get the lg (rounded) of a scaled number.

Get the lg of <code>Digits&#42;2^Scale</code>.

Returns <code>INT32&#95;MIN</code> when <code>Digits</code> is zero.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h/#l00214">214</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h">ScaledNumber.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getLgCeiling() {#adcdfc7209364d72aac80aee58254acc4}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class DigitsT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>int32&#95;t llvm::ScaledNumbers::getLgCeiling (DigitsT Digits, int16&#95;t Scale)</>}>
Get the lg ceiling of a scaled number.

Get the ceiling of the lg of <code>Digits&#42;2^Scale</code>.

Returns <code>INT32&#95;MIN</code> when <code>Digits</code> is zero.

### getLgFloor() {#a0c36a1c641beec6d22d4e371786cfce1}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class DigitsT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>int32&#95;t llvm::ScaledNumbers::getLgFloor (DigitsT Digits, int16&#95;t Scale)</>}>
Get the lg floor of a scaled number.

Get the floor of the lg of <code>Digits&#42;2^Scale</code>.

Returns <code>INT32&#95;MIN</code> when <code>Digits</code> is zero.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h/#l00223">223</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h">ScaledNumber.h</a>.

### getLgImpl() {#a702c858977d4ae7925fc8adca73af8cd}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class DigitsT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>std::pair&lt; int32&#95;t, int &gt; llvm::ScaledNumbers::getLgImpl (DigitsT Digits, int16&#95;t Scale)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Implementation of <a href="#ab63347a46b40b723f19ea7e153024a5e">getLg()</a> and friends.

Returns the rounded lg of <code>Digits&#42;2^Scale</code> and an int specifying whether this was rounded up (1), down (-1), or exact (0).

Returns <code>INT32&#95;MIN</code> when <code>Digits</code> is zero.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h/#l00188">188</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h">ScaledNumber.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getRounded() {#a8cfbb3bd6b2b9dbaee4f30a5b5fa5968}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class DigitsT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>std::pair&lt; DigitsT, int16&#95;t &gt; llvm::ScaledNumbers::getRounded (DigitsT Digits, int16&#95;t Scale, bool ShouldRound)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Conditionally round up a scaled number.

Given <code>Digits</code> and <code>Scale</code>, round up iff <code>ShouldRound</code> is <code>true</code>. Always returns <code>Scale</code> unless there&#39;s an overflow, in which case it returns <code>1+Scale</code>.


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
adding 1 to <code>Scale</code> will not overflow INT16&#95;MAX.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h/#l00052">52</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h">ScaledNumber.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### matchScales() {#a9a4a7b9b4d6238cae16ec640dfd5d980}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class DigitsT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>int16&#95;t llvm::ScaledNumbers::matchScales (DigitsT &amp; LDigits, int16&#95;t &amp; LScale, DigitsT &amp; RDigits, int16&#95;t &amp; RScale)</>}>
Match scales of two numbers.

Given two scaled numbers, match up their scales. Change the digits and scales in place. Shift the digits as necessary to form equivalent numbers, losing precision only when necessary.

If the output value of <code>LDigits</code> (<code>RDigits</code>) is <code>0</code>, the output value of <code>LScale</code> (<code>RScale</code>) is unspecified.

As a convenience, returns the matching scale. If the output value of one number is zero, returns the scale of the other. If both are zero, which scale is returned is unspecified.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h/#l00287">287</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h">ScaledNumber.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition

Multiply two 64-bit integers to create a 64-bit scaled number.

Implemented with four 64-bit integer multiplies.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h/#l00108">108</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/scalednumber-h">ScaledNumber.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/scalednumber-cpp/#l00022">22</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/scalednumber-cpp">ScaledNumber.cpp</a>.
